brief: This is the base class used for the Processing XML library, representing a single node of an XML tree

methods.name: parse()
methods.desc: Converts String content to an XML object

methods.name: getParent()
methods.desc: Gets a copy of the element's parent

methods.name: getName()
methods.desc: Gets the element's full name

methods.name: setName()
methods.desc: Sets the element's name

methods.name: getChildCount()
methods.desc: Returns the element's number of children

methods.name: hasChildren()
methods.desc: Checks whether or not an element has any children

methods.name: listChildren()
methods.desc: Returns the names of all children as an array

methods.name: getChildren()
methods.desc: Returns an array containing all child elements

methods.name: getChild()
methods.desc: Returns the child element with the specified index value or path

methods.name: addChild()
methods.desc: Appends a new child to the element

methods.name: removeChild()
methods.desc: Removes the specified child

methods.name: getAttributeCount()
methods.desc: Counts the specified element's number of attributes

methods.name: listAttributes()
methods.desc: Returns a list of names of all attributes as an array

methods.name: hasAttribute()
methods.desc: Checks whether or not an element has the specified attribute

methods.name: getString()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an attribute as a String

methods.name: setString()
methods.desc: Sets the content of an attribute as a String

methods.name: getInt()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an attribute as an int

methods.name: setInt()
methods.desc: Sets the content of an attribute as an int

methods.name: getFloat()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an attribute as a float

methods.name: setFloat()
methods.desc: Sets the content of an attribute as a float

methods.name: getContent()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an element

methods.name: getIntContent()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an element as an int

methods.name: getFloatContent()
methods.desc: Gets the content of an element as a float

methods.name: setContent()
methods.desc: Sets the content of an element

methods.name: format()
methods.desc: Formats XML data as a String

methods.name: toString()
methods.desc: Gets XML data as a String using default formatting

description:
XML is a representation of an XML object, able to parse XML code. Use loadXML() to load external XML files and create XML objects.

Only files encoded as UTF-8 (or plain ASCII) are parsed properly; the encoding parameter inside XML files is ignored.
name: XML

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: creates a node with this name
